title: Fiskars Crafts 8190 RazorEdge Fabric Shears, 9-Inch,Orange
description: Perfect for a wide range of sewing and quilting tasks, Fiskars RazorEdge fabric Shears feature premium-grade, stainless-steel RazorEdge blades precision honed to an ultra-sharp edge to make sure every cut is crisp and clean. RazorEdge fabric Shears also offer excellent comfort and control thanks to sculpted finger and thumb loops. An advanced pivot design provides ultra-smooth cutting action, and an included sheath helps protect the blades when not in use.
